statements: UPDATE payment_reports SET payment_amount = 100.00 WHERE report_id = 'e2897856-501c-4b66-9dc0-5ac5e1a91038';
UPDATE payment_reports SET payment_date = '2022-10-15 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 'a1c58abb-71b2-428f-a2da-4d9e9b1a5663';
UPDATE payment_reports SET payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE product_id = '395fae0b-4cd2-41f0-a02f-6ad7a45402e5';
UPDATE payment_reports SET payment_amount = 1000 WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payment_reports SET payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE user_id = '456e89b3-12d3-456a-4266-141740123456' AND payment_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE payment_reports SET product_id = '789e12d3-a456-4266-8914-174012345678' WHERE payment_amount > 500 AND payment_method = 'Paypal';
UPDATE payment_trends SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE payment_trends SET payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE transaction_id = 2;
UPDATE user_spending SET total_spent = 500.25 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE payment_trends SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE user_spending SET total_spent = total_spent * 1.1, last_transaction_date = NOW() WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE payment_trends SET payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';
UPDATE payment_trends SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE payment_id = 1;
UPDATE user_spending_patterns SET total_spent = total_spent + 50 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE popular_products SET total_sales = total_sales + 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE payment_trends SET amount = 50.5 WHERE payment_id = 1001;
UPDATE user_spending_patterns SET total_spent = total_spent + 100 WHERE user_id = 2001;
UPDATE popular_products SET total_sales = total_sales + 1 WHERE product_id = 3001;

UPDATE user_spending SET total_spent = 500.75 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE product_sales SET total_sales = 50 WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';

UPDATE product_sales SET total_sales = total_sales + 10, price = price + 5 WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE payment_reports SET amount = 150.00 WHERE payment_id = 1234;
UPDATE user_spending SET total_spent = 500.00 WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE product_popularity SET purchase_count = 50 WHERE product_id = 5678;
UPDATE payment_reports SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE user_spending SET total_spent = total_spent + (SELECT amount FROM payment_reports WHERE user_id = user_spending.user_id ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 1);
UPDATE product_popularity SET purchase_count = purchase_count + 1 WHERE product_id = 1001;
